sn35.102:4.2: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.102:4.4: The eye isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.102:4.6: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
sn35.102:4.16: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact isn’t yours: give it up.
sn35.102:4.18: Giving it up will be for your welfare and happiness.
